title: 【解密】THE TOWER|塔|1.11.2|MINE 52 TEAM
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:22 编辑 




简介INFOWelcome to the Tower where your goal is to find anyway to get to the top.Being over 120 blocks high you will have to use your parkour skills and your brain power to make it.
Playtime: Hard: 30min-1hr欢迎来到“塔”，你的目标是要找到到顶上的方法。在120格以上，你需要用你的跑酷技巧和你的脑洞。游玩时间：难：30分钟~1小时



规则 rules1 Player ONLY. 不支持多人Allow command blocks. 允许命令方块Get to the top. 到塔的顶上






制作者 createrBrenden_MC          Ddog3385It5meSamNico_The_ProFire_Glory_PvpPiBubbleGumJR
